*** NEW *** Widget Weather Radar on iOS 8!!! ***
No more opening Apps to see current conditions.
Just swipe down and voila! Any time you want Weather Radar is ready for you!

Now you can add Rain and Snow radar to notification center on iOS 8. Pull down Notification center and go to Edit and choose Weather Radar Widget!
